text.tspan: Check that there are sufficient priveledges on the cluster to deploy the app
Retrieve the app manifest and branding data
[if not an airgap install (from "airgap-install" cli flag)]
Check if this is part of a KURL install
Build the deployment configuration from cli arguments, configmaps, and files
Check if running on OpenShift (in resources list)
Check if running on GKE (in resources list)
Push the images to the docker registry the cluster pods will pull from
[if this is an airgap install (deployOptions.AirgapRootDir) and there is an image registry override (deployOptions.RegistryConfig)]
If the namespace wasn't created, check if it exists
[if there was an error creating the namespace]
Get the cluster limits to add to the deploy options
Create the "kotsadm-airgap-meta" configmap from airgap.yml in the airgap bundle
[if the error is an already exists error]
Create the "kotsadm-airgap-images" configmap from images.json created when uploading images
[if the error is an already exists error]
Create any additional namespaces in the application metadata
Store the provided license as a cluster secret
[if there was a license file provided (deployOptions.License)]
Store the provided configvalues as a cluster secret
[if there was a configvalues file provided (deployOptions.ConfigValues)]
Store the private registry login credentials
Store the kotsadm configuration, merging any existing values.
Merge the existing config with the generated one
[if the admin console is disabled (deployOptions.ExcludeAdminConsole) and the kotsadm config is enabled
Store the private registry login credentials
Store the kotsadm configuration, merging any existing values.
Merge the existing config with the generated one
Generate the MinIO stateful set configuration and store it
[if the stateful set does not exist]
Merge and update the stateful set configuration
Wait for the MinIO stateful set to be ready
Generate the rqlite stateful set configuration and store it
[if the stateful set does not exist]
Merge and update the stateful set configuration
Wait for the rqlite stateful set to be ready

svg.text: Self Subject Access Review of resource attributes [Verb: *, Group: *, Version: *, Resource: *]
GET configmap [namespace: deployOptions.Namespace, configmap: "kotsadm-confg"] %% kotsadm-confg is correct
GET configmap [namespace: deployOptions.Namespace, configmap: "kotsadm-confg"] %% kotsadm-confg is correct
